title: The Mirror of Galadriel (1R55)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Possession
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each Elf ally whose home is site 6 is strength +1. Maneuver: If an opponent has at least 7 cards in hand, exert Galadriel to look at 2 of those cards at random. Discard one and replace the other.
Lore:	”'What you will see I cannot tell….'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Game text is an erratum.
